channel.title: [Suggestion] Add a Basic Game History
channel.description: Would Love to be able to simply see how many times I've won or lost with each class Currently once a game is over or we quit the game we can't see any of the results, I hate that when the game crashes or I leave because I died and there's no priest I can't see what happened during the rest of the game

item.title: [Suggestion] Add a Basic Game History
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
WyrmWyrd:

I hate that when the game crashes

this is a reason

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Add a Basic Game History
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
You shouldn’t quit a game because you are dead. Sometimes I do if I’m not invested in the game at all, but you shouldn’t quit.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Add a Basic Game History
item.dc:creator: WyrmWyrd
item.description:
Would Love to be able to simply see how many times I’ve won or lost with each class Currently once a game is over or we quit the game we can’t see any of the results, I hate that when the game crashes or I leave because I died and there’s no priest I can’t see what happened during the rest of the game
